casebody.data:
Steven M. FISHER
v.
HOUSING AUTHORITY. No. 94PA03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2004. K. Edward Greene, Raleigh, Matthew S. Sullivan, for Housing Authority-Kinston. Janet Ward Black, Greensboro, for Steven M. Fisher. Bradley N. Schulz, Smithfield, for N.C. Academy of Trial Lawyers. Clay A. Collier, Wilmington, for N.C. Assoc. of Defense Attys.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of June 2003 by Plaintiff to Strike Reply Brief of Appellant:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2004."
